snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron said he thought it would be “wrong” for government ministers to attend the Games, which start Friday, but British athletes will be allowed to compete.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; British officials will boycott the Winter Paralympics in Sochi over host Russia's military action in Ukraine, but will allow British athletes to compete; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron said he thought it would be “wrong” for government ministers to attend the Games, which start Friday, but British athletes will be allowed to compete.

headline.main: British Officials to Boycott Sochi Paralympics
headline.print_headline: British Officials to Boycott Sochi Paralympics Over Russian Intervention in Ukraine
